dkeep.logic

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • dkeep.logic.Map

  • public class Map
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Map(char[][] map, int[][] map_doors, int[][] map_keys)
      Special constructor used in JUnit tests
      Map(int level_id)
      Basic map constructor, it also creates a backup to use in conjunction with other methods

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      char check(int map_x, int map_y)
      Getter that returns the character in the map with coordinates equal to the arguments
      int checkDoor(int map_x, int map_y)
      Getter that returns the value of the door (the key/lever with the corresponding value opens that door) in the given position, if there is one (returns 0 otherwise, or if the door can't be open)
      int checkKey(int map_x, int map_y)
      Getter that returns the value of the key (or lever) in the given position, if there is one (returns 0 otherwise)
      int getMapXSize()
      Getter that returns the size of the level map in the x-axis
      int getMapYSize()
      Getter that returns the size of the level map in the y-axis

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        Basic map constructor, it also creates a backup to use in conjunction with other methods

        level_id - Identifies the map to load

           int[][] map_doors,

        public int checkKey(int map_x,
                    int map_y)
        Getter that returns the value of the key (or lever) in the given position, if there is one (returns 0 otherwise)

      • checkDoor

        public int checkDoor(int map_x,
                     int map_y)
        Getter that returns the value of the door (the key/lever with the corresponding value opens that door) in the given position, if there is one (returns 0 otherwise, or if the door can't be open)
